overview.led_not_set_tips: The LED time has not been set.
overview.memory_tips: The memory shown is the memory available to the Linux system. The total memory is less than the physical memory because some of it is allocated to the Wi-Fi subsystem or other boot areas.
overview.fan_setting_tips: CPU temperature threshold for fan start is $$$$ ~ $$$$ .
overview.temperature_threshold_warning: Set to this threshold, the fan may always be running.
overview.usb3_switching_tips: This feature supports USB 2.0 and USB 3.0 protocol switching.
overview.usb_switch_from_to_tips: Are you sure you want to switch from {usb1} to {usb2}?
overview.switching_to_usb3_tips: When switching to USB3.0, please re-plug the USB flash drive.
overview.switching_to_usb2_tips: After switching from USB3.0 to USB2.0, all connected USB devices will be remounted.
overview.switching_warning_tips: Ensure that the USB flash drive is not in use; otherwise, the data on the USB flash drive may be damaged.
overview.switch_to_usb2_tips: After switching from {usb3} to {usb2}, all connected USB devices will be remounted.
overview.switch_to_usb3_tips: When switching to {usb3}, please re-plug the USB flash drive.
overview.usb_switch_tips: This feature supports {usb2} and {usb3} protocol switching.
